virophage.render

Class HexagonNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • virophage.render.RenderNode
      • virophage.render.HexagonNode

  • public class HexagonNode
extends RenderNode
    A HexagonNode is a graphical representation of a cell. It can be scaled.
    Since:
    2014-05-6
    Version:
    1.0 (Alpha)
    Author:
    Max Ovsiankin and Leon Ren
